name: Vegan Chocolate Strawberry Pancakes
description: Fluffy and rich vegan chocolate strawberry pancakes for breakfast? Yes! These pancakes are stuffed with thinly sliced strawberries, spiced with Mexican cinnamon, and drizzled with maple syrup.

video.name: Vegan Chocolate Pancakes
video.description: Vegan Chocolate Pancakes, drizzled with maple syrup.

recipeIngredient: 2  tbsp.  Coconut oil  ((sub unsweetened apple sauce))

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine the almond milk, ground flaxseed. Mix well, and let rest for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl combine the almond milk, ground flaxseed. Mix well, and let rest for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add vinegar, water, vanilla extract, and oil (or applesauce) to the almond milk mixture. Whisk to incorporate.
recipeInstructions.name: Add vinegar, water, vanilla extract, and oil (or applesauce) to the almond milk mixture. Whisk to incorporate.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and cocoa powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and cocoa powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a well in the center of the flour bowl and add liquid mixture. Whisk until a lumpy batter forms. Let rest for 10 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a well in the center of the flour bowl and add liquid mixture. Whisk until a lumpy batter forms. Let rest for 10 min.

recipeInstructions.text: To cook pancakes, heat a skillet to medium-low heat and grease lightly. Pour batter onto pan and place 3 strawberries on the pancake batter. Use a spoon to spread some of the batter on top of the strawberries to cover them. Let cook for about 3 min. or until fluffy and golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: To cook pancakes, heat a skillet to medium-low heat and grease lightly. Pour batter onto pan and place 3 strawberries on the pancake batter. Use a spoon to spread some of the batter on top of the strawberries to cover them. Let cook for about 3 min. or until fluffy and golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Flip and cook pancake on other side for 3 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Flip and cook pancake on other side for 3 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat with the rest of the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Repeat with the rest of the batter.

keywords: chocolate and strawberry, chocolate pancakes, vegan chocolate pancakes, vegan pancakes
